select-by-device.caption: SCIF - System Control Interface
select-by-device.info: Driver for the SCIF (System Control Interface). The SCIF controls the Oscillators, PLL/DFLL, Generic Clocks, BODs, the voltage regulators and general purpose low power registers.

module.caption: SCIF System Control Interface - UC3C implementation
module.info: Driver for the SCIF (System Control Interface). The SCIF controls the Oscillators, PLL, Generic Clocks, BODs, the voltage regulators and general purpose low power registers.

module.caption: SCIF System Control Interface - UC3L implementation
module.info: Driver for the SCIF (System Control Interface). The SCIF controls the Oscillators, DFLL, Generic Clocks, BODs, voltage regulator, Temperature Sensor and Backup Registers.

module.caption: SCIF System Control Interface - UC3D implementation
module.info: Driver for the SCIF (System Control Interface). The SCIF controls the Oscillators, PLL, Generic Clocks, BODs, voltage regulator, Temperature Sensor and Backup Registers.
